summary.span: 管理位值的压缩数组，这些值以布尔值的形式表示，其中 表示此位为开 (1)， 表示此位为关 (0)。

span.span: Manages a compact array of bit values, which are represented as Booleans, where indicates that the bit is on (1) and indicates the bit is off (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个集合类，其中的容量始终与计数相同。The class is a collection class in which the capacity is always the same as the count. 通过增加 属性将元素添加到 ;通过减小 属性删除元素。Elements are added to a by increasing the property; elements are deleted by decreasing the property. 的大小由客户端控制;索引结束后 引发了 。The size of a is controlled by the client; indexing past the end of the throws an . 类提供了在其他集合中找不到的方法，包括允许使用筛选器一次性修改多个元素的方法，如 、、、和 。The class provides methods that are not found in other collections, including those that allow multiple elements to be modified at once using a filter, such as , , , , and . 类是一种结构，提供与 相同的功能，但性能更快。The class is a structure that provides the same functionality as , but with faster performance. 的速度更快，因为它是值类型，因此在堆栈上分配，而 是引用类型，因此在堆上分配。 is faster because it is a value type and therefore allocated on the stack, whereas is a reference type and, therefore, allocated on the heap. 可以存储完全32位，而 可以存储可变位数的位数。 can store exactly 32 bits, whereas can store a variable number of bits. 存储位标志和小整数，因此它非常适合不向用户公开的数据。 stores both bit flags and small integers, thereby making it ideal for data that is not exposed to the user. 但是，如果所需位标志的数目未知、可变或大于32，请改用 。However, if the number of required bit flags is unknown, is variable, or is greater than 32, use instead. 在 命名空间中; 在 命名空间中。 is in the namespace; is in the namespace. 可以使用整数索引访问此集合中的元素。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 此集合中的索引从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化 以及如何打印出其值。The following code example shows how to create and initialize a and how to print out its values. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型的公共静态（ Visual Basic）成员是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不为 提供同步（线程安全）包装。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a .

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的第一个字节表示0到7位，第二个字节表示第8到第15位，依此类推。The first byte in the array represents bits 0 through 7, the second byte represents bits 8 through 15, and so on. 每个字节的最小有效位表示最低索引值： "`bytes` [0] & 1" 表示位0，"`bytes` [0] & 2" 表示 bit 1，"`bytes` [0] & 4" 表示 bit 2，依此类推。The Least Significant Bit of each byte represents the lowest index value: " `bytes` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `bytes` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `bytes` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on. 此构造函数是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `bytes`中的元素数目。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `bytes`.

span.span: Performs the bitwise AND operation between the elements of the current object and the corresponding elements in the specified array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个操作数都 `true`，则按位 "与" 运算返回 `true`; 如果 `false`一个或两个操作数，则返回 `false`。The bitwise AND operation returns `true` if both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if one or both operands are `false`. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在两个 对象之间执行按位 "与" 运算。The following code example shows how to perform the bitwise AND operation between two objects. summary.span: 创建 的浅表副本。

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .
A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合的浅表副本仅复制集合的元素，无论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但不复制引用引用的对象。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新集合中的引用指向原始集合中的引用所指向的相同对象。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 与此相反，集合的深层副本会复制元素以及元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is .

abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the entire .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位到集合中的最后一个元素之后， 返回 `false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则 未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，用于指示 是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.
This property is always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性，因为 接口需要此属性。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（确保线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).
This property is always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性，因为 接口需要此属性。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此属性，可以使用以下语法来访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 该C#语言使用[this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this)关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作;设置属性也是 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation; setting the property is also an `O(1)` operation.

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-
is equal to or greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 返回相同的值。 and return the same value. 可以设置为特定值，但 为只读。 can be set to a specific value, but is read-only. 如果 设置为小于 的值，则将截断 ，并且删除索引 `value`-1 之后的元素。If is set to a value that is less than , the is truncated and the elements after the index `value` -1 are deleted. 如果 设置为大于 的值，则新元素将设置为 `false`。If is set to a value that is greater than , the new elements are set to `false`. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation. 设置此属性是一个 `O(n)` 操作。Setting this property is an `O(n)` operation.

exception.span: 该属性已设置为一个小于零的值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类可以使用 属性提供自己的 的同步版本。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须对 的 执行操作，而不是直接在 上执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改 对象的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果仅 `true`一个操作数，则按位 "异或" 运算返回 `true`，如果两个操作数具有相同的布尔值，则返回 `false`。The bitwise exclusive OR operation returns `true` if exactly one operand is `true`, and returns `false` if both operands have the same Boolean value. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在两个 对象之间执行 XOR 运算。The following code example shows how to perform the XOR operation between two objects.
